name: Chronostorm: Siberian Border
description: A dynamic real-time strategy, tells about the hot battles that could happen in the near future on the eastern borders of Russia.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1 Processor: Pentium 4/Athlon XP 2.4 ГГц Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB DirectX: Version 8.1 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1 Processor: Pentium 4/Athlon 64 3.2 ГГц Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 8.1 Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews.review_text: decent game, from 09, and for a dollar, you get what you expect  if you enjoyed older RTS games like RA1/2 and the earlyer rts style strat games, this game isnt that bad
I love rts' but the game was just a pain to play, it was jerky (the camera jerked around as you moved) and it was hard following the story, commands etc
